DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Group cycling class ( Spinning® ) improve pain functional outcome patient knee osteoarthritis Methods : Patients symptomatic knee OA randomize active Spinning® class 2-3 per week control group 3 month . Outcomes include gait speed , WOMAC , KOOS , KOS , VAS pain rest 6 min walk perform baseline 12 week .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Group Cycling ( Spinning® ) With Knee Osteoarthritis : A Randomized Control Trial
DOC.criteria: symptomatic radiographic knee OA severe patella femoral knee pain would make cycling difficult medical condition would prohibit exercise program
